Endangered Animals

Endangered animals are those species that are in danger of extinction. Today so many species are vanishing from the Earth each year, at a rate faster than the mass extinctions of dinosaurs about 6 million years ago. Galapagos penguins and Galapagos giant tortoises which Darwin observed in 1835 are also one of the endangered species now. These are some of the endangered animals on the Earth.
